string.text: Ну, калі вы ўбачыце некага падобнага, паведаміце мне.
Вы не змаглі знайсці шпіёна. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}расчаравана{?}расчараваны{\?}.
Я {?PLAYER.GENDER}хацела{?}хацеў{\?} бы далучыцца да {FACTION_SERVICE_TERM}.
Дзякуй. Я ўпэўнены, што вашыя хлопцы каштуюць сваіх грошаў..
Файнага дня.
Ну... Я не ведаю, што сказаць. Напэўна, да пабачэння.
Не хвалюйцеся, я прывяду яе.
Вядома. Мы пачакаем іншыя партыі каля {GATHERING_SETTLEMENT} пэўны час, а потым ідзіце ўслед за намі.
Гэта жарт? Вы маеце нахабства прасіць мяне пра паслугі, {PLAYER.NAME}. Я вас запэўніваю, вы іх не атрымаеце.[if:convo_stern]

Так, {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}яна{?}ён{\?}, імаверна будзе {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}расхвалявана{?}расхваляваны{\?}. Але не з-за таго, аб чым вы думаеце. Бачыце, {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}паабяцала{?}паабяцаў{\?} мяне сыну аднаго з {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}яе{?}яго{\?} хаўруснікаў, і гэта разбурыць {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}яе{?}яго{\?} планы. Гэта праўда.
Я гавару са шматлікімі людзьмі. Зразумела, паколькі я адданы {QUEST_GIVER.NAME}, я заўсёды шукаю шпіёнаў. Але я не знайшоў нікога.
Апошнім часам мы чуем шмат скаргаў на вас. Вам лепей пачаць вясці сябе добра, інакш вы атрымаеце добрую лупцоўку.[if:convo_mocking_revenge]
Дзякуй, {?PLAYER.GENDER}пані{?}панове{\?}. Мы рушым неадкладна.
Дзякуй. Я не магу гарантаваць, што зраблю тое ж самае для вас, але дакладна аддзячу.
Вы не заслугоўваеце даверу. Мяне не цікавіць вашая прапанова.
Вам лепей сысці зараз.
Стой! Нам болей не трэба змагацца. У нас няма рознагалоссяў з вамі, справядлівасць узяла верх.
Пакуль не, але не на доўга.
Я - {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. Я валодаю зямлёю у акрузе, і гавару ад імя шматлікіх жыхароў гэтай вёскі.
Усе пешкі ШІ заблакаваны. Выдаленне адной пешкі гульца, каб зрабіць ход

Ну, мы любім, каб турніры былі запамінальнымі. Каб фундатары ядналі высілкі і набывалі прыз, пра які будуць гаварыць на кірмашах цягам некалькіх тыдняў. Напрыклад, каштоўны клінок або пародзісты баявы конь. Тое, чым будзе ганарыцца чэмпіён.
А... Ну, баюся, гэтага недастаткова.
Гараджане расказалі вам, што ў шпіёна няма характэрных шнараў або знакаў на твары.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, гандляр з {SETTLEMENT_NAME}, сказаў вам, што {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}яе{?}яго{\?} дачка, {TARGET_HERO.LINK}, або выкрадзена, або збегла з мясцовым разбойнікам. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}Яна{?}Ён{\?} прапаноўвае ўзнагароду {BASE_REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} таму, хто знойдзе маладую жанчыну і верне яе назад. Вы пагадзіліся адшукаць яе і вярнуць у {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Калі вы не зможаце знайсці іх сляды на выхадзе з селішча, вам варта наведаць вёскі поруч з {SETTLEMENT_NAME}, каб знайсці доказы і сляды выкрадальніка.
Проста праязджаў міма. Што тут здарылася?
{SALUTATION_BY_PLAYER}, Я жадаю быць нечым большым, чым наймітам. Ці ёсць магчымасць зрабіць мяне васалам.?
Ёсць яшчэ пытанні?
А цяпер... Калі вы пытаеце,[ib:normal]
Я - {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}, гандляр. Я гандлюю ў {SETTLEMENT_STRING}. {BUSINESS_STRING}
Вы не ладзіце з іншымі чальцамі кампаніі. Будзе лепей, калі вы сыдзеце.
У мяне ёсць хвілінка, {?PLAYER.GENDER}спадарыня{?}спадар{\?}. Мне трэба вярнуцца да ткацкага станка. Чым я магу вам дапамагчы?
Я вельмі спадзяюся, што вашыя людзі змогуць вярнуць маю дамову. Клянуся імем бацькі, я болей ніколі не буду гуляць у азартныя гульні.
Эх... Думаеш, кіраваць гарадскімі вуліцамі лёгка? Ты нас недаацэньваеш. Зараз пра грошы.
{SALUTATION_BY_PLAYER}, Я жадаю вызваліцца ад клятвы, дадзенай вам.
Вызваленне ад клятвы? Хм, магчыма, гэта да лепшага... Аднак, {PLAYER.NAME}, вы павінны быць упэўнены, што вызваленне - гэта тое, чаго вы жадаеце. Гэта не робіцца легкадумна.
Прыйшлі падстрыгчыся, {?PLAYER.GENDER}мая спадарыня{?}мой спадар{\?}? Новы вобраз для новага дня?
Вы вядомы як {?PLAYER.GENDER}адважная ваярка{?}адважны ваяр{\?} і выдатны лідар, {PLAYER.NAME}. Я з задавальненнем прыму ваш меч на сваю службу, калі вы гатовыя прысягнуць мне на вернасць.
Вы жадаеце выйсці замуж за труп? Таму што я заб'ю вашага каханка, калі вы не паслухаецеся.
Цяпер, {PRISONER_NAMES} {?IS_PLURAL}палонены{?}палонены{\?} тут.
Я не выконваю загадаў ад такіх, як вы.
Я хацеў бы даручыць вам новую ролю.
Я не перакананы. Я буду бараніць абвінавачанага, пакуль вы не адумаецеся.

Бясспрэчна. Я сам наймаў шпіёнаў. Але калі ўдзельнік турніру задае пытанні пра стан гарнізона і сценаў, пра рэчы, якія не хвалююць ніводнага сумленнага падарожніка. Што ж, прааналізаваўшы ўсю інфармацыю, я думаю, гэта і ёсць той, каго мы шукаем. Шпіён, напэўна, хаваецца ў {SELECTED_SETTLEMENT}. Як толькі вы апыняцеся там, пачніце распытваць гараджанаў.
Мм. Мяркую. Гэта адцягне мяне ад усіх праблем, з якімі мне даводзіцца мець справу.
Цяпер у вас досыць довадаў для вызначэння шпіёна. Мажліва, вы зможаце знайсці ўдзельнікаў турніру, што матляюцца ў завулках з мясцовымі бандытамі. Знайдзіце іх і пагаварыце.
Гэта гучыць дорага.
слуга гаспадарства {FACTION_NAME}
Ці ёсць іншы спосаб вырашыць гэтую праблему, апроч распытаў?
...і я буду на тваім баку, каб змагацца з тваімі ворагамі, калі табе спатрэбіцца мой меч.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}страціла{?}страціў{\?} права ўласнасці на {QUEST_SETTLEMENT}. Вашы кантракт з {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}ёй{?}ім{\?} быў скасаваны.
Гэтага хопіць. Вы зрабілі мудры выбар, мой сябар. Мы хорошо относимся к нашим верным бойцам, и вы можете рассчитывать на достойное вознаграждение за свою службу.

Вы пытаеце ў вёсцы, ці не бачыў хто-небудзь {TARGET_HERO.LINK} альбо падазроных персанажаў з маладой жанчынай.\n\nВяскоўцы расказваюць, што раніцай яны бачылі маладога мужчыну і жанчыну, якія нядаўна прыехалі. Яны набылі такія-сякія запасы і рыссю адправіліся ў бок {TARGET_VILLAGE}.
Я магу суправаджаць вас цягам 10 дзён. Пасля гэтага я мушу вярнуцца да сваіх уласных справаў.
Німр, Німр быў забіты. Памёр у клетцы Бану Кілд.{newline}Усе жанчыны плачуць ад гора. Усе мужыкі ўздыхаюць з палёгкай.
Я ведаю пра адзін, які пачынаецца ў {CLOSEST_TOURNAMENT}. Вы зможаце дабрацца туды, калі будзеце рухацца досыць хутка.
Хмф. Няўжо?[ib:closed][if:idle_angry]
Супакойцеся. Вашае паланенне скончылася.
Я б палічыў за лепшае пакінуць складанасць на ранейшым узроўні.
Вы востра думаеце. Нашае гаспадарства хацела б пачуць вашыя думкі па важных пытаннях.
Безумоўна. Добрая гульня заўсёды робіць розум актыўным і свежым.
Раскажыце болей. Што не так з гэтым чалавекам?
Ці магу я выступіць пад сваім уласным сцягам?
Выведнік {CURRENTLY_HELD_SCOUT}
Зараз я не магу нікога пашкадаваць. Вам давядзецца ісці адной.
Скасаваць
Я - {PLAYER.NAME}. Давайте обойдемся без любезностей и перейдем сразу к делу.
Жадаеце пабавіць час за гульнёй у {GAME_NAME}?
Калі я вам спатрэблюся, вы ведаеце, дзе мяне знайсці.
Няхай будзе так. Ходзьма. {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}
Заплаціце суму золата, і неўзабаве будзе адкрыта майстэрня. Нам трэба арганізаваць некаторыя інструменты і працоўных.
Тое, што зрабіў мой чалавек, было няправільна, гэтае немагчыма адмаўляць. Але яго павесілі, а што мне зараз рабіць? Ці нясуць яго дзеці яго віну?
Я думаю, прайшло не так шмат часу з апошняга бартару.
Дык вось... У нашых землях прынята плаціць нам падатак за абарону, калі не жадаеце бою.
Спадзяюся, вы не пашкадуеце пра сваё рашэнне, {?PLAYER.GENDER}мая пані{?}мой панове{\?}.
Тут ціха. Занадта ціха. Тут ніколі не бывае ціха задоўга.
Вы маеце рацыю. Я не магу гэтае зрабіць, таму вярнуся да сваёй сям'і.
Хмм.. Файна. Прабачце за адцягванне.

Вы будзеце прылічаны да сыноў Эсера. Ваша кроў - наша кроў. Нашыя мячы будуць бараніць вашыя правы, як вы бароніце нашыя. Вы можаце піць з нашых студняў і адпачываць у цені нашых дрэваў. Вам можа быць дадзена права судзіць і збіраць падаткі з аазісаў і гарадоў.
Так ці іначай, вы пашкадуеце аб гэтым. Калі я паду, мой народ адпомсціць.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
Адкуль мне ведаць, што ён не прымушае цябе гаварыць гэтае?
Вельмі файна, пані. Спадзяюся, мы хутка сустрэнемся зноў.
Будзь праклята лета. Не магу спаць па начах з-за спякоты. А зараз кажуць, што студня вычэрпваецца...
мы сочым за завулкам, {.%}{ALLEY_NAME}{.%}, для яго гаспадароў... {ALLEY_USE}, каб сюды не спрабавалі пракрасціся тыя, у каго няма праў.
Як вы можаце дапамагчы мне? Абароніце?
Ураджай быў скупым. Нас чакае галодная зіма і жорсткая вясна. Памятайце мае словы.[rf:convo_grave]
Я ўсё яшчэ не ўпэўнены ўва ўсім гэтым, але я давяраю вам. Давайце вырашым гэтае.
Абярыце назву клана {COMPANION.NAME}:
Я думаю пра іншага чалавека.
Вы пашкадуеце, што соўваеце свой нос у пытанні, якія вас не тычацца!
Добра. Я чакаю вашага бегуна.
Прабач, мой сябар, але мне патрэбна твая дапамога ў гэтай справе.
Магчыма сфармаваць караван з лепшымі ваярамі?
Так. Ходзьма, я адвяду вас да {TARGET_NOTABLE.NAME}, каб вырашыць гэтае пытанне мірным шляхам.
Я рады, што знайшоў вас. Далучайцеся да маёй партыі.
Прабачце за пах, {?PLAYER.GENDER}шляхцянка{?}шляхціч{\?}. На жаль, я займаюся дубленнем. Чым я магу вам дапамагчы?
У мяне ёсць для вас заданне...
Дык вось, я чуў ад {RANDOM_RELATIVE}, што ён прадаў {._}{PLURAL(ITEM_NAME)} у {TOWN_NAME} і атрымаў прыбытак {PRICE_DIFF}{GOLD_ICON}.
Добра. Здаецца, я зразумеў.
На жаль, я дазваляю рабіць стаўкі толькі, калі гуляю ў поўную моц. Вам трэба павялічыць складанасць.
Выбачце, але сёння шанцы на маю карысць вельмі вялікія, і я не магу прапусціць гэты шанец.
Я магу паехаць сам або паслаць кампаньёна.
Добра. Тады паўтарайце за мной словы клятвы: {OATH_LINE_1}
Так, {?PLAYER.GENDER}пані{?}панове{\?}.

У мяне праблема. Мой малады сваяк {PRODIGAL_SON.LINK} адправіўся ў горад забаўляцца, піць, гуляць і граць у рызыковыя гульні. Многія маладыя людзі так робяць, але, здаецца, ён быў трохі бязглуздым. Зараз ён перадае вестку пра тое, што вінен вялікую суму грошаў {TARGET_HERO.LINK}, аднаму з верхаводаў мясцовай банды з горада {SETTLEMENT_LINK}. Гэтыя нягоднікі трымаюць яго ў якасці “госця“ ў сваёй хаце, пакуль хто-небудзь не аплаціць яго пазыкі.
Не... Не. Гэта бессэнсоўна.
Якую ролю вы сабе адводзіце?
Тады сустрэнемся знадворку, капітан.
Даруйце. Ідзіце шляхам праведніка, і Нябёсы абароняць вас.
Што вы прапаноўваеце?
Колькі людзей вам трэба для гэтага? За кожнага я хачу па 100{GOLD_ICON}.
Мне вельмі шкада гэтае чуць. Але ведайце, гаспадарства {FACTION_NAME} - лепшы працадаўца, будзьце ў гэтым упэўнены.
Коўнэйн
Гэта вялікі гонар.
Што? Я не разумею.
Сардэчна запрашаем у нашыя шэрагі. Давайце заб'ём гэтых вырадкаў!
Прыемна, што вы з намі.
Дзякуй, {?PLAYER.GENDER}шаноўная спадарыня{?}шаноўны спадар{\?}, дзякуй.
Распытаўшы жыхароў горада, вы даведаліся, што ў шпіёна ёсць барада.

{ISSUE_OWNER.NAME} просіць гульца дапамгчы маладому чальцу клана. Напэўна, у яго велізарныя ігральныя абавязкі, таму верхаводы банды трымаюць яго ў закладніках. Вас просяць вярнуць яго ўсякім магчымым спосабам.
Вашы клан ваюе з фракцыямі, з якімі ў гаспадарства {KINGDOM} мір.
Вы вольныя ісці куды жадаеце, {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}спадарыня{?}спадар{\?}.
Мью Тарэры
Што вы тут вырабляеце?
Я разумею. У такім разе, я адпушчу вас.
Я думаю пра іншую майстэрню.
Імператар Арэнікос адчуваў сябе добра. Пайшоў спаць з кубкам віна.{newline}Раніцай ён быў мёртвы. Цяпер замест яго гаспадарыць жонка!

Толькі адданыя мне васалы могуць валодаць землямі і замкамі ў маім гаспадарстве, і ўсе мае васалы мужчыны. Я не схільны адступаць ад гэтай традыцыі без вельмі важкай прычыны. Калі вы праявіце сябе ў боі, то зможаце прынесці мне клятву вернасці і стаць маім васалам. Потым мы зможам абмеркаваць спосаб атрымання замка.
Я чуў, што за крайнімі палямі хаваюцца разбойнікі. Завошта мы плацім падаткі, я кажу? Чаму людзі {?OWNER.GENDER}шляхцянкі{?}шляхціча{\?} {OWNER.LINK} не выконваюць сваю працу?
Цяпер я не магу сабе гэтае дазволіць.
Я жадаю, каб вы служылі гаспадарству {FACTION_NAME} у якасці найміта.
Я не магу сядзець тут вечна. Паспяшайцеся.
Паўтараю: здавайся альбо змагайся!
Файна. Смерць лепей за ганьбу![if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
Не магу цяпер гаварыць. Трэба сачыць за ўсім вакол.
Я буду прыслухоўвацца да тваёй думкі, плаціць належную даніну, каб у гэтай зямлі быў дужы абаронца.
Ну, а цяпер... Невялікае ахвяраванне на нашую справу срэбрам, каб прайсці.

Ды будзе вядома, што з гэтага дня вы {?PLAYER.GENDER}мая слушная паслядоўніца{?}мой слушны муж{\?} і васал. Я даю вам сваю абарону і права насіць зброю ад майго імя. Я клянуся, што я не пазбаўлю вас жыцця, волі або маёмасці, апроч як па праўным выраку нашай шляхты або па законе і абычаі краіны.

You decided to stay out of the fight. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} will certainly lose to the rival gang without your help.
Talk to her
Well, I am disappointed, but I am sure that you will have many chances to redeem yourself.[ib:closed][if:convo_bored]
I have hardly heard of you, {PLAYER.NAME}. Go fight a few bandits, make a name for yourself. Then we can talk.
I am waiting for the right moment.
I have a quick question.
Quartermaster {CURRENTLY_HELD_QUARTERMASTER}
I own {STRING_UNTIL_NOW} there.
I need more time.
I want to visit the lord's hall.
You don't have enough money to buy this workshop.
Actually, I was going to talk about something else.
All right then. I'll have a look at the prison.
We came here looking for work, as there was none in the village. But the masters want skilled hands only. With a few coins, I could go home.
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.LINK}. {FACTION_DESCRIPTION}
{SETTLEMENT} is under siege. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is canceled.
{LORD_INTRODUCTION_STRING} {TOWN_INFO_STRING}
You are right, {?PLAYER.GENDER}my lady{?}sir{\?}. I should be moving immediately.
I would like to change what you are producing here.
I wish to reward you for your services.
I am not allowed to talk with you.[ib:nervous]
Let's begin, then.
Search the village
You don't have the money to hire us.
Did I ask you to speak? Your kin best scrape together a ransom before my patience runs out.
Of course, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}.
Certainly! Looks like a few of our lads are warming up now for the tournament. You can go and hop in if you want to. Or come back later if you just want to practice.[ib:warrior]

You ask around the village if anyone saw {TARGET_HERO.LINK} or some suspicious characters with a young woman.

Villagers say that there was a young man and woman who arrived here exhausted. The villagers allowed them to stay for a while.
You can check the area, and see if they are still hiding here.
We are only mercenaries serving under {EMPLOYER_FACTION_INFORMAL_NAME}. We cannot negotiate peace on behalf of our employers.
That looks good, let's play!
How much will you pay me for my service?
A pleasure to have met you.

Ah, yes, these are the most interesting kinds of games, aren't they? I won't deny myself the pleasure but clearly that deed is worth more to him than just the value of the land. I'll wager the deed, but you need to put up 1000 denars.
You are not a part of this world anymore.
Speak respectfully about your elders, you filthy ragamuffin!
No! I won't go anywhere near them! They'll kill me![ib:closed]
No, we are doing fine.

Yes, we're hiring mercenaries. We pay you to fight, though, not just ride around the countryside. You'll get {MERCENARY_AWARD}{GOLD_ICON} whenever you take down an enemy party, or do a similar service.
{KEY} Sit
Follow me.
You're breaking the law.
Well, it will cost you {COST}{GOLD_ICON} to buy it out. Are you going to buy it?
Right now I'm looking for work, if you have anything to offer.

Good, even better. You can find the house easily when you go to {SETTLEMENT} and walk around the town square. Or you could just speak to this gang leader, {TARGET_HERO.LINK}, and talk some sense into {?TARGET_HERO.GENDER}her{?}him{\?}. Good luck. I await good news.
Well, if he wanders off to another town, or gets his throat slit, or loses the deed, that would be the wrong moment, now wouldn't it?
That's too much. I will be back later.
{PERSUASION_OPTION_LINE} {SUCCESS_CHANCE}
Until next time, then.
I am sure you can solve it.
I'm afraid I don't have time for another game.
You can count on me, {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}.
I accept. Let us stop making war upon each other, for the time being anyway
I swear to fight your enemies and give shelter and water to your friends...

Well, even the practice fights draw those who like to bet on the outcome. But the tournaments! Those pull in crowds from miles around. The merchants love a tournament, and that's why they pony up the silver we need to pay the good souls like you who take and receive the hard knocks.
Just get out of my sight.
Excellent! Have a good day, then, {?PLAYER.GENDER}my lady{?}my lord{\?}.
Why doesn't {OWNER.LINK} do anything about the thieves plying their trade out on the street? Could it be that {?OWNER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} is getting a cut of their take?
What? Why? Did I do something wrong?[ib:closed]
You defeated the Game Host and got the deed back. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.{newline}"Thank you for resolving this issue so neatly.. Please accept these {GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars with our gratitude."
I thank you.[if:convo_focused_happy]
Yes... I am weary of fighting you. I could offer you a truce of forty days. If you keep your word and do not molest my lands and subjects, we may talk again...
Farewell, my husband. Safe travels, and a swift return.
a servant of the Heavens
Well I'm anxious, but I am in your hands now. I trust you will protect me {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}sir{\?}.
What are you playing at, {PLAYER.NAME}? Go and make up your mind, and stop wasting my time.
No, sorry. Haven't seen anything like that.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} wants you to find a spy before he causes any harm...
I hear {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is going to sort it out with {RIVAL_GANG_LEADER.LINK} once and for all.
Things are good, and {NOTABLE.LINK} says we should credit this to the wisdom of {?OWNER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} {OWNER.LINK}.

You can keep my relative under your protection for a time until the calls for vengeance die down. Maybe you can leave one of your warrior companions and {ALTERNATIVE_TROOP_COUNT} men with him to protect him.
I do not believe we have any quarrel with you.
Stop! We don't need to fight any longer. You proved your point. We will accept the blood money.
Thank you {PLAYER.NAME}, I hope your people will be successful.
Old skinflint {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME} is my great-uncle's son, and not a blessed penny will {?NOTABLE.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} give me in hard times.
Your clan is now at war with {QUEST_GIVER_SETTLEMENT_FACTION}. Quest is canceled.
Then I'll make it worth your while. (-{BRIBE_MONEY}{GOLD_ICON})
We leave the arena open to anyone who wants to practice. There are no rules, no teams. Everyone beats at each other until there is only one fighter left standing. Sounds like fun, eh?[ib:confident2]
{?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} cares nothing about me! Only about {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} reputation in our district.
Whom are you looking for?
suppose someone wanted to buy some goods and didn't want to pay the customs tax. We might be able to help that person out.
your highness
All right then. I'll leave now.
It's almost harvesting season.
Then you are sure? Also, be aware that if you leave my services, you will be surrendering to me all the fiefs which you hold in my name.
I have a proposal that may benefit us both.
I believe you have already pledged yourself to another liege.

Yes, I don't care how you solve it. Just solve it any way you like. I reckon {NEEDED_MEN_COUNT} led by someone who knows how to handle thugs could solve this in about {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_DURATION} days. I'd send my own men but it could cause complications for us to go marching in wearing our clan colors in another lord's territory.
Aye? What is it?
many more

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, a {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} from the {QUEST_GIVER_CLAN} clan, asked you to go to {SETTLEMENT} to free {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} relative. The young man is currently held by {TARGET_HERO.LINK}, a local gang leader, because of his debts. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has suggested that you make an example of the gang so no one would dare to hold a nobleman again. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} said you can easily find the house in which the young nobleman is held in the town square.

Well.. There are many goods around the town that can bring good money if you trade them. A caravan you formed will do this for you. You need to pay at least {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} to hire {NUMBER_OF_MEN} caravan guards to form a caravan and you need one companion to lead the caravan guards.
Thank you {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}sir{\?}. For your kindness and understanding. We won't forget this.
Never mind.
About your position in the clan...

You have failed to defeat the thugs that keep {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s relative captive. After your assault you learn that they move the boy to a more secure place. Now its impossible to find him. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} will have to deal with {TARGET_HERO.LINK} himself now. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} won't be happy to hear this.
On second thought, such an accord would not be in my interests.
I can increase quality of troops, but cost will proportionally increase, too.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, a gang leader from {SETTLEMENT} has told you about a rival that is trying to get a foothold in {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} town. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} asked you to come back after {DAY_COUNT} days until they make their final preparations for an attack.
That's the right call, boss. You should never let go of a good investment.
Ah. A good match, that.
I hope so.
One of {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME}'s hunting hounds took down my cousin's sheep, but {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME} paid twice the beast's value in compensation -- very fair, I say, very fair indeed.
We will fight for you if you can afford our fee. Please have a look at our terms and see if they are acceptable.
I no longer need you as Surgeon.
Hello, {PLAYER.NAME}. Good to see you again.
The {?NOTABLE.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} {NOTABLE.LINK}...
Let it be known that you are one of the Battanians. You may till our soil and sit in our councils. Who quarrels with you, quarrels with all of us.
We'll make ready to set out at once.
Аб заданні, якое вы мне далі...
I will be honored. See you outside.[DEBUG]
After that winter, the cow's too thin to pull the plough. Don't know where I'll get the money to rent one.[rf:convo_grave]

Yes -- there is something you can do for us. We have heard reports that a group of {s4} have established a hideout in this area, and have been attacking travellers. If you could find their lair and destroy it, we would be very grateful.
Працягнуць
Yeah. About that {NOTABLE.LINK}. A hard {?NOTABLE.GENDER}one{?}master{\?} to work for, they say. One mistake and you're out on the street.

You have failed to extract {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s relative captive in time. They have moved the boy to a more secure place. Its impossible to find him now. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} will have to deal with {TARGET_HERO.LINK} himself now. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} won't be happy to hear this.
Let's finish this!
You couldn't find the spy and dueled the wrong warrior. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is disappointed.
I'm {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. There's some who know me as {CONVERSATION_HERO.LINK}. That's a term of respect, by the way.[if:convo_mocking_revenge]
Are you the {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?} who thinks our blood is cheap, that we will accept silver for the life of one of our own?
Thank you my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. I will always remember this grand gesture.[rb:positive][rf:happy]
Is there anything else?
You are wounded and in disguise.
Rejoin the others and let's be off.
Unfortunately, I can't take you back right now.
Anything else?
We do not need hired swords currently because we are not at war. You should seek your fortune elsewhere.
You have done a wise thing, {PLAYER.NAME}. Serve me well and I promise, you will rise high.
As the magistrate of this district, I hereby order that blood money shall be accepted. This is a crime of passion, not malice. Tell {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} to take the silver or face my wrath!
You were unable to defeat {RIVAL_GANG_LEADER.LINK}'s gang, and thus failed to fulfill your commitment to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
I have no wish to fight, but I shall certainly not surrender.[ib:closed]
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has finally sent a messenger telling you it's time to meet {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} and join the fight.
Just a minute..
Yeah. I've seen one like that around the arena, asking all matter of outlandish questions. Middle-aged, normal head of hair, that's really all I can remember though.
I do not see it as being in my current interest to make peace.
My father? Oh, thank god! I saw terrible things. They took my beloved one and slew many innocents without hesitation.
Let my contract be ended.
I found a purse with {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} a few paces away. I reckon it belongs to you.
Well, I thought you were here to be sheared, but it looks like the sheep bites back. Very well, nicely played, here's your man's land back.
Thank you, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}sir{\?}.
Hello there, are you looking for a friendly match? A wager perhaps?
Very well.
I fear I cannot accept such a mission at the moment.
I no longer need you as Engineer.
They say {NOTABLE.LINK} is hiring at {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} {.%}{SHOP_TYPE}{.%}. {?NOTABLE.GENDER}She{?}He{\?}'s a slippery one.

As well you might! They're a grand old imperial custom that's now spread all over Calradia. Back in the old days, they'd give a hundred condemned criminals swords and have them slash at each other until the sands were drenched in blood![if:convo_merry]
Let me think again.
Good to meet you.
So be it.
You are right, {LORD_SALUTATION}. My place is here.
You haven't got enough denars to change production.
{HERO.LINK} should be just around the corner...[ib:normal]
Sure. You know where to find me.
Yeah, you might say that. Heh. Still, I can't let you into the prison.[if:convo_bemused]
You may be entitled to that land in recompense for your service to us. [Will cost {VALUE} influence]
You have found {QUEST_GIVER.NAME}'s daughter.
my friend

Nowadays things are a little different, of course. The emperors got worried about the people's morals and steered them toward more virtuous kinds of killing, like wars. But the games still go on, just with blunted weapons.
I do not have the authority to make peace on behalf of the {ENEMY_INFORMAL_NAME}. Our council should decide whether to offer peace, and what the terms will be.
I want to speak with a prisoner.
If a worthy task presents itself, however, I may have a favor to ask of you at a later date.
Right... {GOLD_AMOUNT} Here you are.
Hard times... Hard times indeed.
Tell me how it's in my interest...
I must say, my lady, I am indeed delighted to have met you. I hope to see you again soon.
Right...Well, I gave you a chance.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
May I be of service, {?PLAYER.GENDER}your ladyship{?}your lordship{\?}?
Hard times... Can't find good help these days. Half of 'em are too hungry to work. The other half are thieves. Smart ones all left weeks ago.[rf:confused_annoyed]
A mouthy one, eh? At him, lads![ib:aggressive][if:idle_angry][ib:normal]
Very well. As you're paid for each battle, not for a fixed period of time, you can end it whenever you like.
I'll be sheep.
You won a deed of land from my associate. I'm here to win it back.

I'm {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. I've lived all my life here, working the land, as do my kin. A lot of the people here in {VILLAGE_NAME}, the common farmers and craftsmen like me, they like me to speak for them.
We had a good run boss. Maybe we can work again some time. It will take sometime to pack things up and everything.
Barter line - you should not see this.
None of your business.
On second thought, forget it.
And as such, that you are my commander, and I shall follow you wherever you lead.
I will talk with them right away
Do you have any orders for your alley, {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}
I no longer need you as Scout.
Thank you, but there's no need. Once we are out of here I can manage to return on my own. I appreciate your efforts. I'll tell everyone in my clan of your heroism.
Yeah, sure. Later, then.
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}, {FACTION_DESCRIPTION}. I have come here because many have gone astray, and listen to false preachers who distort the true meaning of the divine revelations.
Reward Items
Let me see what you have for sale...
There's money to be made from a place like this
Any traveler can be asked by an enemy to spy on the places he travels. How can I track this one down?
{COMPANION} left your party.
{MENTOR.NAME}'s House
And by the way, we take orders from {ALLEY_BOSS.NAME}, and no one else.
Mmm, a generous gift to my coffers would certainly help matters... {BRIBE_MONEY}{GOLD_ICON} should do it. If you agree, then I'll go with your suggestion.
As the local {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, you pressured {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} to accept the blood money and resolved the issue peacefully.
I am deeply obligated to you. I shall endeavor to do what I can, within the bounds of honor, to return the favor.[if:convo_focused_happy]
Sure thing, boss.[ib:demure]
Actually, I think you're the one who ought to surrender.
Thank you.
We're on our way to {HERO.LINK}...[ib:demure]

Hmm... Only loyal vassals of {FACTION_LEADER} can own lands and castles. While kings will sometimes accept vassalage from men who prove themselves in battle, and grant them land, I have never heard of a king who gave fiefs to women. You had best discuss that issue with {FACTION_LEADER} himself.

Ah! I was looking for this all day. How good of you to bring it back {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. Well, now that I know what an honest {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}man{\?} you are, there can be no harm in letting you inside for a look. Go in.... Just so you know, though -- I'll be hanging onto the keys, in case you were thinking about undoing anyone's chains.
All of you can stop following me and return to what you were doing.
I will assign a companion with {NEEDED_MEN_COUNT} good men for {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_DURATION} days.
{KEY} Use
Afraid I can't recall anyone like that, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}.

You have agreed to talk to {CULPRIT.LINK} in {QUEST_GIVER_SETTLEMENT} first and convince him to go to {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} with you in {TARGET_SETTLEMENT} and mediate the issue between them peacefully and end unnecessary bloodshed. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} said {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} will pay you {REWARD_GOLD} once the boy is safe again.
Yes, you are right. I shall be on my way...
You can't practice in the arena because there is a tournament going on right now.
I will do that.
Ah. In that case, there is little I can do, unless you have some further argument to make.
Yes, I'll play again.

I accept you as my sworn follower. You shall have the warrior's due: the warmth of my hearthfire and the bread of my fields, and gold for your valor. I shall uphold your rights under the Law of the Sturgians and avenge your blood if you fall.
I want you to join my party.
Clans that own a settlement are not considered as mercenaries.
Actually, I've changed my mind. I'll talk to {?HERO.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} later...
Round is over, your team is qualified for the next stage of the tournament.
How gallant. I hope some day I may be in a position to return the favor.
I am pleased to hear it, {PLAYER.NAME}. I hope you'll banish such unworthy thoughts from your mind from now on.
I'm not surrendering, so do what you must.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
Time to butcher and salt our meat for the winter.
Fine, you know {ALLEY_BOSS.NAME}, you can be here. Just no trouble, you understand?
Your duel has not ended yet!
Yes, of course. Just ask me if there is anything you need.
Yes, yes. Goodbye.
No, not now.
I might be willing to pay for passage.
Those troublemakers - they're not from around here. I can't believe it's anyone from around here. You hear people talking foreign more and more these days - I'm sure it's them.

My sister's husband is in the tavern with all the layabouts, throwing away his wages on drinking and dice while his family weeps. I hope {NOTABLE.LINK} gathers some righteous folk and sets fire to it! I'd carry a torch myself, I would.
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. I have been chosen by the people of {REBEL_SETTLEMENT_NAME} to lead them in their struggle against tyranny.
I promised to protect the boy at the cost of my life. If you try to harm him, you will bleed for it.
{SALUTATION}... Thank you for freeing me.
In order to find {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s daughter, you have decided to visit nearby villages.
Great. As I said we need minimum of 3 days to prepare. I will remind you when we are ready to move on them. Just don't leave the town before we settle this matter.
Lucon Lucon I've been told, sir. Was born old and just got older.{newline}Lives in a palace made of gold. Where it's always dark and it's always cold.
Take whatever time you need, my lady.
What do you want us to make?
You are my prisoner now.
Yeah... Now I remember you.
Thank you.
You bet! Say, you look like a fighter. You should join. Back in the old days it was all condemned criminals and fights to the death, but nowadays they use blunted weapons.
Good day, friend. I'll bet you came here for the games, or as they say nowadays, the tournament!
I'm not sure why
I shall claim it.
Farewell, then.
your ladyship
I have great hopes for you {PLAYER.NAME}. I know you shall prove yourself worthy of the trust I have placed in you.
Now, some will tell you that {NOTABLE.LINK} is no better than a common thief who deserves the gallows, but my cousin says {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME} did him a good turn. So I don't know what to believe...
Now, feel free to place a bet.
You are right. Maybe we need to persuade {QUEST_GIVER.NAME}
Why yes... At the tavern last night... Cornered a drunk and kept pressing him for information about the gatehouse. Had a beard, that one did.
I don't want to fight, but I will if you make me.[ib:closed][if:idle_angry]
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s village {QUEST_SETTLEMENT} was raided. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is canceled.
I no longer need you as Quartermaster.
You would need to talk to our leader {KING.LINK} on this matter. {?KING.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} is {?IS_PRISONED}unfortunately held captive{?}currently{\?} {?IS_IN_SETTLEMENT}at{?}near{\?} {SETTLEMENT}.
Lamed by an arrow in the leg, and now I can't work a field and I'm no use to anyone, they say.
Good. You may pass.
You have defeated the thugs that were guarding the alley.
Lead the way.
Sure. Why not?
Their direction is marked with an arrow in the campaign map.
I gave my word to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, and I won't be bought.
Very well. Now, what side do you want?
I will go off on my own, then. I can stay busy. But I'll remember - I owe you one!
You can't move. Chose one of the opponent's pawns to remove and make a move
Yeah... Later.

I've got a problem... And {?TARGET_NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} name is {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK}. {?TARGET_NOTABLE.GENDER}Her{?}His{\?} people have been coming around outside the walls, robbing the dice-players and the drinkers enjoying themselves under our protection. Me and my boys are eager to teach them a lesson but I figure some extra muscle wouldn't hurt.
Eh, what do you mean by that?[ib:closed][if:convo_annoyed]
Tell me how the practice fights work.
I've heard that story before. What did you lose?
Gang leader needs help to beat the rival gang.
That is lower than what I had in mind. Let me think about it.
I have some questions.
Come see me again soon, {PLAYER.NAME}, you hear?
Right... Well, you be off, then. Keep safe.
I'm just having a look. Do you mind?
Good. Pay us our dues, according to the laws of our people, and you shall have safe passage.
I'm sorry but I gave a promise. I don't break my promises.
Greetings, traveler. Do you play {GAME_NAME}? I am reckoned a master of this game, the traditional pastime of the {CULTURE_NAME}. If you are interested in playing, take a seat and we'll start.
I'll be white.
We are waiting for your good news {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}sir{\?}.
Listen to me. Have any of the tournament participants spent long hours in the market and tavern? More than usual?
Farewell. If no one slits your throat out there, perhaps we shall meet again.
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}, a merchant here in {SETTLEMENT_STRING}. {BUSINESS_STRING}
Have you met the man who took my deed? Did you get it back?
Thank you, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. If your men can find my girl and bring her back to me, I will be so grateful. I will pay you {BASE_REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} for your trouble.
Sounds good. I wish to enter your service as a mercenary.
You managed to find the spy but lost the duel. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is disappointed.
As you wish. Let me know if you change your mind.
That was fun, but I've learned not to inflict too great a humiliation on those who carry a sword. I'll take my winnings and enjoy them now. Good-bye to you!
Whose workshop is this?
As you wish. Your enemies are my enemies.
You heard me. Yield or fight!
Let me think about it.
..and to uphold your rights under the laws of the Sturgians, and the rights of your kin, and to avenge their blood as thought it were my own.
You've cleared some members of a gang off of a territory that they claim. Do you want to stay here to make sure the others don't try to take it back?
Let's do some diagnostics about your faction.
Try to forget all about these and return to your father's house.
Give me the keys to the cells -- now!
Yeah, mate. We know you're trouble. We've been told to look out for you...
Right now I'm working for {EMPLOYER}.
That was a fun game. Thank you.
maybe you've lost something of value. Come ask us, and perhaps we can find it for you. For a fee, naturally.
And what about my duties as a mercenary?

You were defeated by the rogue. He and {TARGET_HERO.LINK} ran off while you were unconscious. You failed to bring the daughter back to her {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}mother{?}father{\?} as promised to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} is furious.
Sure, I'll play at the hardest level.
Please, {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}sir{\?}. I love him truly and I wish to spend rest of my life with him. I beg of you, please don't stand in our way.
Good, good. That's the best way to do these things. Go to {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}, find this game host and wipe the smirk off of his face.
Of course not, {LORD_SALUTATION}. I am ever your loyal vassal.
I'll be black.
Sorry. No progress yet.
Yes, did you bring {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}? That's what he owes... With an interest of course.
Yes, {LORD_SALUTATION}.
Is that so? Well, I suppose you're just not up to the task. I shall have to look for somebody with more mettle.
Here is the money, now release him!
Good to hear that.
Yes... Why not? I have nothing too urgent right now.
I'm willing to sell. But it will cost you {COST} {GOLD_ICON}. Are you willing to pay?
Stay safe, my dear.

Coming to fight me, eh? Did {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} put you up to this? Look, there's no need for bloodshed. This town is big enough for all of us. But... if bloodshed is what you want, I will be happy to provide.
SELECT AN HEIR
Keep safe, {PLAYER.NAME}. I hope to see you again soon.
I'm {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. Ask around about me. You'll be told I keep the peace in the back alleys.[ib:warrior]
Door is locked!
When there's no tournament, it's still worth coming by. A lot of fighters spend their time here practicing to keep in trim, and we'll award the winners a few coins for their troubles.

I proclaim you a citizen of the Empire, of the rank of Senator. Your life and property shall be protected by our laws, and shall not be taken from you except by law. You may serve as a magistrate over towns and villages and as a general over armies, if we call upon you to do so.
Hello there friend. Are you here for the tournament.
Calm down! Your father has sent me to find you.
I want to go back to something you'd mentioned earlier...

Let it be known that you are adopted into the Khuzait confederacy, and that you shall be considered of the ancestry of the 12 sons of the she-wolf. You may sit in our councils of war and of peace. We shall ride to defend your flocks and avenge your blood if you fall. Your herds may graze in our lands and drink from our springs.

{COMPANION.LINK} and the men you sent with {?COMPANION.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} safely return with the news of success. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is happy and sends you {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} regards with {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} the money he promised.
Lead on, then.

Everything is wrong. He is from a low family, the kind who is always involved in some land fraud scheme, or seen dealing with known bandits. Every village has a black sheep like that but I never imagined he would get his hooks into my daughter!
I'm afraid my finances will not allow for such a gift.
I hear there have been secret meetings in the woods. Solemn oaths, signed in blood. A great wind is going to blow soon - you mark my words.
You are right. You are free to deliver justice as you see fit.
Very well, my dear. I hope we can soon sort out the terms of our marriage.
Hmm. That's possible. Which one?
I am still working on it.
You can start.
There's a tournament going on?
Yes, {PLAYER_SALUTATION}. Let me settle my affairs here in {SETTLEMENT}, and I will be with you shortly.
We'll fight to our last drop of blood!
Olek Olek fought a bear. Took it down, fair and square.{newline}Not with his sword and not with his spear. But with his breath of garlic and beer.
You are in disguise.
Apologies, my sword is not for hire.

He is right! I ran away with him willingly. I love my {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}mother{?}father{\?} but {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} can be such a tyrant. Please {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}sir{\?} if you believe in freedom and love, please leave us be.
The lots also determine what weapons you get. The winners of each match proceed to the next round. When only two are left, they battle each other to be declared champion.
Best not sing that to every stranger you meet, child.
My {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, may I have a word please?
You're a good friend to have. A very good friend.[if:convo_focused_happy]
I am {PLAYER.NAME}. And who are you?
Can't let down your guard around here. Too many bastards up to no good.
More men have hair then not, but this is another tile in the mosaic.

We would be eternally grateful if you can help my relative. I have to add, I'm ready to pay you {REWARD_GOLD} denars for your trouble. He is hiding somewhere here, go talk to him and tell him he is safe now.
Round is over, you survived the final round of the tournament.
Actually, never mind.
Heaven protect me![ib:aggressive][if:convo_astonished]
I've heard that {ENEMY_NAME} have been raiding across the border... People around here better wake up.
You did me a good turn. I hope I can repay you.[if:convo_focused_happy]
I'll go right away
Select an heir
This is fair. Join us
Our kingdom is not at war, {PLAYER.NAME}. We have no use for mercenaries.
I knew we'd find you eventually. Now you will face justice!
Bah... Parley's over.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
{ALLEY_ACTIVITY_STRING} {ALLEY_ACTIVITY_ADDITION}
I am afraid I won't be able to do this quest.
Are you ready for the fight?
Okay, is there anything more I can help with?
You're a warrior, are you not? The games are a fine way to make your name. The local merchants put together a nice fat purse for the winner to attract the talent.

I do not have the authority to make peace on behalf of the {ENEMY_INFORMAL_NAME}. {ENEMY_RULER.NAME} and {?ENEMY_RULER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} council should decide whether to offer peace, and what the terms will be.
Very well, please accept these {BRIBE_MONEY}{GOLD_ICON} as a token of my gratitude.
Oh, sorry, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. May I be of service?
The plague took my parents and my uncle took their land. But I'd rather beg than be a servant in a rich man's home!
You are an accomplished player. I will take note of that.
So, uh, there's a young woman around here. I really need to leave her some money before I go anywhere. Let's say {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} - can you pay me that?
Do you indeed, {PLAYER.NAME}? Then go and trip on your sword. Give us all peace.
Come on now. I thought you were the boss here.
I am here for the boy. {PRODIGAL_SON.LINK}. You know who I mean.
With pleasure.
Can I hold on to any castles I take?
Did {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}Lady{?}Lord{\?} {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} sent you to rescue me?
Blood money is appropriate for a crime of passion. But you kill this boy in cold blood, you will be a real murderer in the eyes of the law, and will no doubt die.
I want you to go forage some food.
What now?
You didn't bring {DAUGHTER.LINK} to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} must be furious.
You command the sons of Asera in war and govern them in peace...
What exactly do you want me to do?
I'll just have one more to keep me warm on the way home.
Anything else I can explain?
Just glad to have full bellies this year in my household. Can't say that for every year.
I just have a minute, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. I need to check on a batch that's brewing. How can I help you?
I heard you may need some help with a problem?
The Heavens repay kindness with kindness, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}.

You fell unconscious while defending {CULPRIT.LINK}. {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} has taken revenge. You failed to protect {CULPRIT.LINK} as you promised {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} is furious.
I changed my mind. You can go free.
Your clan is now at war with the {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}’s lord. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} was canceled.
Thank you, {PLAYER.NAME}. I'm sure your companion will be persuasive.

You have successfully protected {CULPRIT.LINK} from harm as you have promised. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is grateful for your service and sends his regards with a purse full of {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars for your trouble.
It was a pleasure to meet you. Safe travels.
I shall do that.
Yeah... Go on, then.
Hope you don't mind all the sawdust around here, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. How can I help you?
I'll go to the tavern and win it back the same way you lost it.
(Currently unassigned)
I know times are hard, but {NOTABLE.LINK} says {?OWNER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} {OWNER.LINK} is doing what {?OWNER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} can, and I trust {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME}.
Ah, my apologies, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. May I help you with something?
Some day you'll see I did you a favor. Pack up, you need to go.
Indeed. You have shed your blood for me, and you deserve a fief of your own..
Now, it grieves us to do this, but we have mouths to feed and we're going to have ask you to pay for passage through our lands. If you refuse, we'll have no choice but to take your money by force.
Don't worry I'll free him.
{ISSUE_GIVER.NAME} wants {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} daughter found
Hot around here, eh {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}? I need to get back to the forges in a minute, but how can I help you?
Help! Help! Prison break!

Certainly! The arena is open to anyone who doesn't mind hard knocks. Looks like a few of our lads are warming up now. You can go and hop in if you want to. Or come back later when there's a tournament.[ib:warrior]

I'll tell anyone who asks: {NOTABLE.LINK} is a righteous {?NOTABLE.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?}, and speaks for the poor folk. The lords of this land must listen to {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}him{\?}, or misfortune will fall upon us.
Indeed.... Did you offer vassalage, then, just to buy time? Very well -- you shall have time to reconsider, but if you are toying with me, it will do your reputation no credit.
Be my guest.
Yes, brother.[ib:demure]
Your clan does not have enough influence to get them to do this!
Your Clan Tier needs to be {TIER}

Your clan is now owner of the settlement. As the {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} of the settlement you cannot get involved in gang wars anymore. Your agreement with the {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has canceled.
You're not going anywhere, friend. You're my prisoner now.
You owe me one.
I am a brother in our order.
I have more important business to do.
Aye, I'll join the {FACTION_NAME}.

I can offer you a contract for three months. At the end of those three, it can be extended month by month. An initial sum of {OFFER_VALUE}{GOLD_ICON} will be paid to you to seal the contract. After that, you'll receive wages from {FACTION_LEADER} each week, according to the number and quality of the soldiers in your company. You still have your rights to battlefield loot and salvage, as well as any prisoners you capture. War can be very profitable at times...
{NOTABLE.LINK} says that a fish rots from the head. Well, look around this place. I think we know what he's getting at.
Round is over, you are disqualified from the tournament.

It's a deed to a plot of farmland. Not a big or valuable plot, mind you, but I'd rather not have to explain to my men why they won't be sowing it this year. You can find the man who took it from me at the tavern in {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}. They call him the "Game Host". Just be straight about what you're doing. He's in no position to work the land. I don't imagine that he'll turn down a chance to make more money off of it.
I'll fight the other gang with you myself.
Very well. Let me think on this a bit longer
Our realms should make peace.
Don't worry, either I or one of my companions should be able to find her and see what's going on.
I won't take you prisoner today.
As you wish..

Perfect. Of course you shall have to make a formal declaration of allegiance, and give your oath that you and your company will remain in service to {FACTION_NAME} for a period of no less than three months.
Very well. You have given me your solemn oath, {PLAYER.NAME}. May you uphold it always, with proper courage and devotion.
Let me know how much of a challenge you can stand and we'll get started. I'm ready to offer you a {DIFFICULTY} challenge and {?IS_BETTING}a bet of {BET_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}.{?}friendly game.{\?}
Do you want to load the saved game with different modules?
We will not sign a peace until we are recognized by all the kingdoms of Calradia.
{?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}My lady{?}Sir{\?}, may I ask for some time to think about this?
The pittance they call a wage these days... I don't want to leave my kin, but I'm thinking I might have to try my luck in some other town.

This is how it goes, friend. This is our turf. We answer to {ALLEY_BOSS.NAME}, and {?ALLEY_BOSS.GENDER}she's{?}he's{\?} like the {?ALLEY_BOSS.GENDER}queen{?}king{\?} here. So if you haven't got a good reason to be here, clear out.
Hmf... Very well. I shall wipe out this insult with your blood.
They say {NOTABLE.LINK} turned one of {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} artisans at the {.%}{SHOP_TYPE}{.%} out on the street for not showing up to work at first light. Hard times, these.
I'm getting this together as quickly as I can.
I hope {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} can work out that trouble with {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} kinsman.
Yes, I'm here to take you back.
Let us speak again soon, {PLAYER.NAME}.
My {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, it would be an honor if you were to choose the name of my noble house.
Look, it was a good try, but they're not going to pay. Releasing the kid is the only move that makes sense.
Very well. But the world being as it is, I'm going to need {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} as a down payment on my services. Can you pay that?
I want to join your army.
There is something I'd like to discuss.
I have a proposal that may spare us both unnecessary bloodshed.
Stay your hand! Perhaps we don't have to come to blows.
You can stop following me now. Thanks.

During the games, all the best fighters from the area form teams and pummel each other. Not quite as much fun for the crowd as watching gladiators spill their guts out, of course, but healthier for the participants.[if:convo_approving]
Get away you vile beggar! You are scaring away my customers!
Very well, then. What is it?
Hope you don't mind the smoke around here, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. Got to keep the kilns hot. How can I help you?
I wish to buy one of your workshops.
Perhaps {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} made those plans because {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} loves you.
Yes. Take these troops with you.
I would like to end my contract with the {FACTION_NAME}.
On second thought, let's keep this match friendly.
Furthermore, I accept induction into the army of Calradia, at the rank of archon.
You failed to protect {CULPRIT.LINK} as you promised {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is furious.
Thank you, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}sir{\?}, for protecting me. I will go and tell {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} what you did for me.
Why not? I'm not going anywhere right now, and I could use another drink.
What's that?
Yes? Do you have something to say?
You can count on me. As of now, your enemies are my enemies and your honor is my honor.
So... Does this please you, {?PLAYER.GENDER}my lady{?}my lord{\?}?

Thank you my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. I am sure your men will protect the boy and {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} will have nothing to do but to accept the blood money. I have to add, I'm ready to pay you {REWARD_GOLD} gold for your trouble.

Your companions report that the {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}'s daughter returns to {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} safe and sound. {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} is happy and sends {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} regards with a large pouch of {BASE_REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON}.
{?PLAYER.GENDER}Madam{?}Sir{\?}, we are still waiting for your men to bring my daughter back. I pray for their success.
Can I change the difficulty?
I want you to recruit some troops.
Never mind.
Very good. I'm sure you'll chose competent men to bring our boy back.
{SALUTATION_BY_PLAYER}, I would pledge allegiance to you and be counted among your loyal followers.
The tax on this, the tax on that... Now just what do we think our beloved {?OWNER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} {OWNER.LINK} does with it all?

What have we here? I heard you thrashed some of my lads. So you're tougher than you look, but I'll have you know that's just the first arrow in my quiver. Leave now and I let you live. Stay, and I'll give you a fight you won't walk away from.

My family is concerned for the boy's life. He has gone hiding around the village commons. We need someone who can protect him until {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} accepts the blood money and ends the feud. We would be eternally grateful, if you can help my relative and take him with you for a while maybe.
Sure. Follow me.
Every day... More people in the markets... More people at the well... Where do they all come from?

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} told you that he lost a land deed in a wager in {TARGET_CITY}. He needs to buy it back, and he wants your companions to intimidate the seller into offering a reasonable price. You asked {COMPANION.LINK} to take {TROOP_COUNT} of your men to go and take care of it. They should report back to you in {RETURN_DAYS} days.
I don't want any trouble. Later.
If it will not please you, then I'll try something else.
And how would you serve us?
Round is over, your team is disqualified from the tournament.
I hate you! You killed him! I can't believe it!. I will hate you with all my heart till my dying days.[if:convo_angry]
I do not care to talk about my past.

A couple of powerful wolves against a flock of helpless sheep. {GAME_NAME} is a game of uneven odds and seemingly all-powerful adversaries. But through strategy and sacrifice, even the sheep can dominate the wolves.
Could you hurry this along? I don't want him to find another buyer. Thank you.
Yes, captain.[ib:demure]
I swear homage to you as lawful {FACTION_TITLE}.
{ROMANTIC_REACTION} {ROMANTIC_DEFICIENCY}
Prodigal son of {CLAN_NAME}
My own people chased me from the village. It weren't true, what they said about me. Coveted my land, I'll warrant.
{SETTLEMENT_NAME}? This is a great honor, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. I will protect it until the last drop of my blood.[rb:very_positive][rf:happy]
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}, {FACTION_DESCRIPTION}. I have come here to warn people that the time when the Heavens tolerate injustice -- those times are coming to an end.
I'll be here, your {?PLAYER.GENDER}ladyship{?}lordship{\?}.
You have nothing on me. If you try to take me anywhere I'll kill you, and it will be in self-defense.[ib:aggressive]
Heaven help us. If I can't pay the rent, I'll end up on the side of the road with the landless, hoping for a day's work.[rf:confused_annoyed]
You have reached the maximum amount of workshops you can have.
I am currently working as {COMPANION_JOB}.
some men might fancy a game of dice. Figure Lady Luck wants to give them a kiss. We're here to keep things honest.
I'm not interested.

I have no doubt that {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} will have to accept the offer after seeing the boy with that many armed men behind him. Thank you, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}, for helping to ending this without more blood.

A decent {?NOTABLE.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?}, {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME} is, as rich folk go. Always keeps a bit of grain to help out any of those who ate their seed over the winter. Knows the worth of a good name, {?NOTABLE.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} does.
Have you been able to talk with my boy yet?
Really boss, if I sell everything, and with all the money we have on hand, you can get {PRICE}{GOLD_ICON}. But I don't know anybody who can afford this right now.
Very good, then. Be on your way.
There is no practice fight because of the Tournament.
Never mind.
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}, {FACTION_DESCRIPTION}. I have come here to share some fragments of the wisdom of the {DIVINITY} that I have been blessed with understanding.
I'd rather do something else
Well well. Who did you bring to see us? Did he bring his funeral shroud with him? I hope so. He's not leaving here alive.
Maybe, but that is your duty to your family.
Good. Let's see if we can work out fair compensation for us protecting the roads.
Leave and meet {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} later
We are doomed I say, doomed. A ruler who cannot control {?RULER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} passions brings ruin on the realm.
My name is {PLAYER.NAME}, {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. May I ask your name?
{FIGHT_DEBRIEF} Do you want to give it another go?
Now, leave peacefully...

{GAME_NAME} is a game of incredibly uneven odds. A weakened and trapped king must try to escape from a horde of attackers who assault from every direction. Ironic how we, the once all-powerful {CULTURE_NAME}, have now fallen in the same position.
{NOTABLE.LINK} says we must trust in the wisdom of the authorities, so long as they follow the laws of the Heavens.
I have no task to offer you right now.
Wait here. We'll see if {?ALLEY_BOSS.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} wants to talk to you. (NOT IMPLEMENTED)
There's bandits lurking just beyond the walls these days. What about the taxes we pay, I ask you? Why aren't {?OWNER.GENDER}Lady{?}Lord{\?} {OWNER.LINK}'s men doing their jobs?
Right now I'm between jobs, so if you've got any work for me, I'm willing to discuss it.
Do you think this one will be faithful to you over many years? I know a rogue when I see one.
This action costs {NEEDED_GOLD_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{GOLD_ICON} and {NEEDED_INFLUENCE_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{INFLUENCE_ICON}. You will also be granting {SETTLEMENT} to {COMPANION.NAME}.
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. I'm a craftsman, a working man. A lot of the other honest men here in {TOWN_NAME}, the ones that work with their hands, they like me to speak for them.
You have yet to show yourself a competent leader of men, {PLAYER.NAME}. Prove yourself against my enemies, and I would be glad to have you as a vassal and entrust you with a fief of your own.
You best talk to the boss.
Well, I am still a novice in this game, but I learned a lot from playing with you.
Leave now and never come back! If we ever see you here we will kill you.
You! You've cut quite a swathe through my men there, damn you. How about we settle this, one-on-one?
a messenger from the ancestors
You lost your horse.
I am ready.
I hope your people are careful about how they proceed. It would be a pity if that spy got away.
The rules of the tournament are standard across Calradia, even outside the Empire. We match the fighters up by drawing lots. Sometimes you're part of a team, and sometimes you fight by yourself.
With the help of your scouting skill, you were able to trace their tracks.
If you let this boy go, his family will remember you did them a favor. That's a better deal for you than a fight you can't hope to win.
As you wish. Will I take some troops with me?
So long as the denars keep flowing, so will the blood of your enemies.

The way {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME} helps out {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} good-for-nothing relatives, {?NOTABLE.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} won't have any seed grain for the next sewing -- and I, for one, will laugh.
Yes, your highness.
My name is {PLAYER.NAME}.
Nothing, nothing. Go on your way.
I should be on my way.
Make peace when I have you at an advantage? I think not.
The demons come at night and taunt me until dawn. What am I to do?
Don't be a stranger, eh? Come see me again some time.
I will not abandon my love, {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}sir{\?}!
Hmm... I keep pretty busy with my own trade. I haven't heard anything like that.
I'm hunting a spy. And now I have found him.
After your attack on the rival gang’s alley, {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} decided to change {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} plans, and doesn’t need your assistance anymore. Quest is canceled.
{CULPRIT.LINK} died. You failed to protect {CULPRIT.LINK} as you have promised {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is furious.
The powers of Heaven and of the Earth have entrusted to you the guardianship of this sacred land...
Your call.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is waiting for you at {SETTLEMENT}.
Very well... You know where to find me.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, a landowner from {QUEST_SETTLEMENT}, told you about an incident that is about to turn into an ugly feud. One young man killed another in an quarrel and the victim's family refused blood money compensation, demanding vengeance instead.
Come {DAUGHTER_NAME.NAME}, let's go before other hounds sniff our trail... I mean... No offense {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}.
I can use someone like you in my company.
I married bad. That was my misfortune. Drinks his wages and beats me when I say a word, so now I must beg for bread for our children.
No thank you. Good day to you.
I want you to patrol the area.
Hard. Don't hold back or you'll regret it.
A problem occured while trying to load the saved game.
I'm interested. Please tell me more.
I'll keep you in mind
Actually, I have other things to do.
Beg pardon, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}, I need to get back to my parents. Is there anything you need?
You will regret this!
Actually I do not have a free companion right now.

Who are you? Are you one of the bounty hunters sent by {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} to track us? Like we're animals or something? Look friend, we have done nothing wrong. As you may figured out already, this woman and I, we love each other. I didn't force her to do anything.[ib:closed]
They say that {OWNER.LINK} is an honest {?OWNER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?}. But even {?OWNER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} can't stop all the thieving and corruption around here.
What do you want?
Thank you for saving me, sir. I won't forget what you did here today.
I want to join your army.
Just checking on you.
I would like to buy this workshop.
Thank the heavens we have {?NOTABLE.GENDER}women{?}men{\?} like {NOTABLE.LINK} to help the poor in these hard times.
Get out of my face, you vile beggar.[if:convo_angry]
Excuse me, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}, but I must shortly go about my business. Is there anything you need?
Sure. I'm happy to turn paper into silver... 1000 denars it is.
It is enough to say that I am looking for a new employer, and I will serve loyally so long as I am treated well and paid well.
Can I change the amount we're betting?
Yes... Please go on.
{QUEST_GIVER.NAME}'s Kidnapped Daughter at {SETTLEMENT}
Forgive me, {LORD.LINK}, I must give the matter more thought first...
Let me try and convince you. (Persuasion)
Anything else? Because unless you've got business here, maybe you'd best move along.[ib:closed][ib:normal]

Duties... There are only a few, none of them difficult. The very first thing is to declare your allegiance. An oath of loyalty to our cause. Once that's done, you shall be required to fulfill certain responsibilities. You'll participate in military campaigns, fulfill any duties given to you by your commanders, and most of all you shall attack the enemies of our kingdom wherever you might find them.
Well, there's one starting up at {CLOSEST_TOURNAMENT}, then another at {NEXT_CLOSEST_TOURNAMENT}. You should probably be able to get to either of those, if you move quickly.[ib:hip]
You know we are at war. Surrender or die.

I said to that good-for-nothing... I said to him, 'You leave my daughter alone, or {NOTABLE.LINK} will hear about it.' Hah! I don't see him tomcatting around outside my home any more, that's for sure.
The townsfolk told you that the spy is not bald.
Just so you know... I'm not cheap. I want {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} as an advance, or there's no deal.[ib:warrior]
I'm afraid I have to consider you my enemy.
As you wish, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}.
On second though I don't want to open a workshop now.
I swear that you are my {?LORD.GENDER}khatun{?}khan{\?}, my {?LORD.GENDER}mother{?}father{\?}, my protector...
As you wish.
Careful around here, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. Don't want to get your hands caught in one of the presses. How can I help you?
we look after the honest folk here. Make sure no one smashes up their shops. And if they want to give us a coin or two as a way of saying thanks, well, who'd mind?
I no longer have need of your services.
Enough! That is enough. We will take the blood money, and make an end of this.
They know me as {PLAYER.NAME}. Mark it down, you shall be hearing of me a lot.
Gather all my companions in the settlement and find me.
I will send {NEEDED_MEN_COUNT} of my men with one of my lieutenants for {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_DURATION} days to help you.
Run along now, child.
Finish this task before it is too late.
Very well, {PLAYER_SALUTATION}. Tell me what you have in mind.
I will be your loyal {?PLAYER.GENDER}follower{?}man{\?} as long as my breath remains...
Actually, never mind.
Thank you for your help. I am still very worried about my girl {TARGET_HERO.LINK}. Please find her and bring her back to me as soon as you can.
I cannot be sure of your loyalty any longer.
Indeed I am, {LORD_SALUTATION}. Forgive my rambling.
{?PLAYER.GENDER}Splendid{?}Good man{\?}! That's clever of you.[ib:normal]
Yes, I have.( {GOLD_COST} {GOLD_ICON})
Tell me who to command.
Many men have beards. Still, that is something.
Good journeys to you, {PLAYER.NAME}.
My wounds are still fresh. I need some time to recover.
It's a good place to hunt deer and boar
I still don't see why I should accept what you're asking of me.
Okay, just keep your eyes open.
Worry not {ISSUE_OWNER.NAME}, my men will be back with your deed in no time.
(Currently held by {COMPANION.LINK})
Very well. I'll get my gear and join you outside.
{KEY} Get Up
On second though I don't want to change what we are producing. Go on like this.
All right! I spare the boy's life. Now get out of my sight
I'll be wolves.
Keep safe, husband.
You cannot own a workshop in an enemy town.
We take raw materials and produce goods and sell them at the local market. After paying the wages we send profits the shop owner.
Farewell, my wife. Safe travels, and a swift return.
If you dare to even breathe against {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK}, it will be your last. You got it scum?
Thank you {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. You are a savior.
Yes, I know {HERO.LINK}.
I swear to heed your judgements according to the laws of the Aserai, and ensure that my kinfolk heed them as well...
Sounds fun.
All right then. I'll try that.
Your men are with my lads now. We will strike when the time is right. I will not forget this favor, I promise.
You are the shield of our people against the wolves of the forest, the steppe and the sea.
I'll be attackers.
Thanks. But I will give my bruises some time to heal.
Safe travels {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}sir{\?}.
You are the chosen of the Sky, and I shall follow your banner as long as my breath remains...
I enjoyed our game. Let?s play again later.
Let us keep going.
my husband
Why should I negotiate for your gold, when I have enough men to simply take it?
Have a nice day, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}.

Only my noble vassals have the honour of carrying their own banners. However, after some time in mercenary service, you may earn the opportunity to swear homage to me and become my vassal, gaining the right to choose a banner of your own and fight under it in battle.
So we fight, then.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
I’m glad someone’s on it. Just see that they do it quickly.
I want to speak with a prisoner (Cheat).
There's no doubt that {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME} is a stiff-necked old goat, but you can't say {?NOTABLE.GENDER}she{?}he{\?}'s not honest as the day is long.
I understand. I'd take you prisoner too, if duty demanded. And I will soon, I hope.
I don't have any more questions.
I accept oaths only from those I can trust to keep them, {PLAYER.NAME}.

You need {NEEDED_GOLD_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{GOLD_ICON}, {NEEDED_INFLUENCE_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{INFLUENCE_ICON}. You don't have {NEEDED_GOLD_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{GOLD_ICON} and {NEEDED_INFLUENCE_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{INFLUENCE_ICON}.
Module Mismatch
Yes, sister.[ib:demure]
No, not really.
You're going to pay me a lot then, {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} to be exact. But at that price, I agree.

You have convinced {TARGET_HERO.LINK} to release {PRODIGAL_SON.LINK}. Soon after, {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}Lady{?}Lord{\?} {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} sends {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} best regards and a sum of {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} as a reward.
Sorry, but we don't know you. We can't just let anyone in. (Not enough renown)
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}, {FACTION_DESCRIPTION}.
You have chosen to side with the rival gang leader, {RIVAL_GANG_LEADER.LINK}. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} must be furious.
Ah. Very well. I don't mind testing your mettle.

Yeah. I have a problem all right. {?TARGET_NOTABLE.GENDER}Her{?}His{\?} name is {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK}. {?TARGET_NOTABLE.GENDER}Her{?}His{\?} people have been bothering shop owners under our protection, demanding money and making threats. Let me tell you something - those shop owners are my cows, and no one else gets to milk them. We're ready to teach these interlopers a lesson, but I could use some help.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} a landowner from {QUEST_GIVER_SETTLEMENT}, told you about an incident that is about to turn into an ugly feud. One youth killed another in a quarrel and the victim's family refused blood money as compensation and wants blood.
There is nobody inside to receive you right now.
A new caravan is created for {HERO.NAME}.

Hmm. Has your oath become burdensome, {PLAYER.NAME}? It is unusual to request release from homage, but in respect of your fine service, I will not hold you if you truly wish to end it. Though you would be sorely missed.
I will not consider your offer. Honor obliges me to fight you.
Greetings, friend. If you came for the games, the big fights, I'm afraid you're out of luck. There won't be games, or a 'tournament' as they say nowadays, any time soon.
We have come to talk! Just listen to us please!
Yeah.. Word is that {._}{ITEM_NAME} sells well in {TOWN_NAME}. A profit of {PRICE_DIFF}{GOLD_ICON} a load, they say.
Business is good. Can't deny that. But prices are high and getting higher.
We're not holding anyone in here right now. There's no reason for you to go in.[ib:closed]
{BASIC_EVAL} {REPUTATION}
I want to talk about other things.
Act normal. Have any of the participants in the tournament come round, asking very odd questions?
Now the man in the market said, 'All this trouble and woe means the Heavens aren't pleased with the one on the throne.' 'That's treason talk!' I told him. Of course I did.
Not Enough Gold
There's good iron, bog iron they call it, that collects on dead logs and the like
Revenge will be taken. Save your breath for the fight...
We must attack before the rival gang hears about our plan. You'd better hurry up!
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} cancels your plans due to the siege of {SETTLEMENT}. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} has worse troubles than {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} quarrel with the rival gang.

You have convinced {CULPRIT.LINK} to go to {TARGET_SETTLEMENT} to face {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} to try to solve this issue peacefully. He agreed on the condition that you protect him from his victim's angry relatives.
All right. I accept

{ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}, the {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} of {QUEST_SETTLEMENT}, has told you about a spy that hides as a tournament attendee. You are asked to expose the spy and take care of him. You asked {COMPANION.LINK} to take {NEEDED_MEN_COUNT} of your best men to go and take care of it. They should report back to you in {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_DURATION} days.
You need {RELATION} relation with {HERO.NAME}.
You can't hide in the shadows forever. I pledge on my honor to protect you if things turn ugly.
It is something I must do, {LORD_SALUTATION}.
Right. Cheers, then.
We are preparing for an attack but we need some time to gather our men. Meet me here in {SETTLEMENT_NAME} after 3 days and we'll strike them together.
When the heat's this bad, a fellow can build up quite a thirst.
As you are not a warrior, you are free to go.
{?PLAYER.GENDER}Madam{?}Sir{\?}, people gossip. Everyone around here knows you've been asking those questions. Your quarry is going to slip away if you don't move quickly.

We welcome valiant warriors into our people, {PLAYER.NAME}, but you must prove yourself. Take your sword to my enemies and make a name for yourself, and we will formally adopt you as one of us. You may be given lands to protect and can speak at our councils.
Please! Bring my daughter back.

I tilled the land of {CRUEL_LANDOWNER.NAME}, and paid my rent, and earned him a pretty penny. But the times changed, the prices changed, he took my tenancy from me and said he'd raise sheep there instead. Where was I to go? What I am to do?
I ask you because you are a trader here. Have you seen one of the warriors in the tournament walking around here, asking people a lot of suspicious questions?
Nothing to report, your ladyship.
The Spy Among Us

You have paid the debt that {PRODIGAL_SON.LINK} owes. True to his word {TARGET_HERO.LINK} releases the boy immediately. Soon after, {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}Lady{?}Lord{\?} {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} sends {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} best regards and a sum of {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} as a reward.
All right then, {PLAYER.NAME}, I will accept this for your sake. But remember, you owe me for this.[if:convo_stern]
I am already currently escorting {ESCORTING_PARTY}. I cannot follow you until this task is complete.
{ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}'s daughter is missing. {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} is offering a substantial reward to find the young woman and bring her back safely.
It's springtime, my friend. The season of the winds. The season of madness. Now then, I believe I'll have another drink.
You need to learn more about the arena by talking with the arena master.
We meet on the battlefield, then.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
No, my friend. I am on a hunt.

If you'd rather not go into the fray yourself, you can leave me one of your companions together with {TROOP_COUNT} or so good men. If they stuck around for {RETURN_DAYS} days or so, I'd count it a very big favor.
{GAME_NAME} is a game of anticipation. With no possibility of capturing, all your effort should be on reading your opponent and planning further ahead than him.

{GAME_NAME} is fast and harsh, as warfare should be. Capture as much as possible to keep your opponent weakened and demoralized. But behind this endless offense, there should always be a strong defense to punish any attempt from your opponent to regain control.
It's only normal that you have second thoughts. I will be right by your side if you change your mind my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}.[rb:positive][rb:unsure]
Then I will find and talk to {KING.LINK}.
Party has less men than 40% of it's party size limit.
{ISSUE_OWNER.NAME} wants you to beat the game host
I am thinking of a different location.
Safe travels to you, my lady. I hope to see you again soon.
I accept your duel.
Gather my troops here and have them rejoin my party.

Ah yes... It is a bit embarrassing to mention, but... Well, when I am in town, I often have a drink at the inn and perhaps play a round of {GAME_TYPE} or two. Normally I play for low stakes but let's just say that last time the wine went to my head, and I lost something I couldn't afford to lose.
That will only make this more fun. How much were you thinking?
{WORKSHOP_DESCRIPTION} Are you sure you want to open {.%}{.a}{WORKSHOP_TYPE}{.%}?
Yes, I would like to sell.
The foes of Vlandia came a-plundering. King Derthert summoned his men to the keep!{newline}They rode to his muster with their hooves a-thundering. But Derthert had already gone to sleep.
Have a nice day my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}.
Not much work to be done... Sewing and mending and what.
Ah! You almost had me! Maybe you just weren't paying attention. Care to put another 1000 denars on the table and have another go?
the service of {.^}{RULER_TITLE} {RULER.NAME}
So can I join?
I had hoped that perhaps things would not come to fighting, at least not today.[ib:closed]

I am hosting a tournament at {SELECTED_SETTLEMENT}, and am expecting contenders to partake from all over the realm. I have my reasons to believe one of the attending warriors is actually a spy, sent to gather information about its defenses.
Ah - I don't know of any right now. That's a bit unusual though. Must be the wars.[ib:closed]
Very well. When next we meet, I can't promise things will go so peacefully.
You have bought the deed from the game host. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.{newline}"I knew I I was right with betting on you. Please accept these {GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars with my gratitude."

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} told you that he lost a land deed while playing games in a tavern in {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}. He wants you to go find the game host and win it back for him. You told him that you will take care of the situation yourself.
You may have a point. I hereby revoke my previous decision.
Reward Troops
Yes? Go already. Get our boy back.
Heard that {NOTABLE.LINK} is making money hand over fist from {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} {.%}{SHOP_TYPE}{.%}. A cunning one, {?NOTABLE.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} is.
Excellent, {PLAYER.NAME}, excellent. I have every confidence in you.[if:idle_happy]
Right... So, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}, how can I help you?

Yes, well, we do hire mercenaries... And some of them, I'll admit, are men of honor. Your reward will be {MERCENARY_AWARD}{GOLD_ICON} for every group of enemies you vanquish, or for an equivalent deed.
This winter... Kids are all coughing and wheezing. My old ma's been bed-bound for a month. Can't afford coals for the stove at night. Spring thaw can't come fast enough for me.
Let me inspect your troops.

I am sure that, as {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} of this district, you will not let these unlawful threats go unpunished. As the lord of the region, you can talk to {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} and force him to accept the blood money.
You won the duel but your opponent was innocent. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is disappointed.
What choice do I have you heartless bastard![if:convo_furious]
