I am pleased to grant you the title of {CULTURE_SPECIFIC_TITLE} and the fiefdom of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.. You richly deserve it.
So, what shall I do?
I guess the only way to free you from this pretty boy's spell is to kill him.
I wish to form a caravan in this town.
War is all about sacrifice. In {GAME_NAME} you must make sure that your opponent sacrifices more than you do. Every move can expose you or your opponent and must be carefully considered.
You are already oath-bound to serve {FACTION_NAME}, are you not?
Farewell, my lady. I shall remain your most ardent admirer.
Tournament is over.

Thank you, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. I have often thought about that. If I had a fief, with revenues, and perhaps a title to go with it, I could marry well and pass my wealth down to my heirs, and of course raise troops to help defend the realm.
Well there was one handsome warrior. Maybe younger than the others. Didn't have all the scars and whatnot that some of these hard cases pick up in their battles.
Would you like to play another round of {GAME_NAME}?
I give you my word and bond, to stand by your banner in battle so long as my breath remains...
{RIVAL_GANG_LEADER}'s Party
The gang starts to come at you, but slowly, so you still have time to back off. Do you wish to stand and confront them?
Heaven watch over us. Heaven give us strength.
we help out those who are down on their luck. Give 'em a purse of silver to tide them by. With a bit of speculative interest, naturally.
Match is over
I have no problem with the boy anymore, okay? Just leave me alone.
So, yeah... My {RANDOM_RELATIVE} says he took some {._}{PLURAL(ITEM_NAME)} to {TOWN_NAME} and made {PRICE_DIFF}{GOLD_ICON} in profit. Course he might be talking out of his arse.
Actually, I have changed my mind.
What kind of workshop do you want to open here?

{PLAYER.NAME}, you are a {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} without a master, holding lands in your name, with only the barest scrap of a claim to legitimacy. No king in Calradia would accept a lasting peace with you.
I wish to buy your {.%}{WORKSHOP_NAME}{.%}.
Relax. I've talked with your relative, {QUEST_GIVER.NAME}. I know all about your situation. I'm here to help.
Still haven't taken you to {HERO.LINK}...[ib:demure]
I will be on my way soon enough.
Of course. I'll pass on your orders. Anything else?
I don't fight duels with brigands.
I've changed my mind. You may go on your way.
I am thinking of a different person
Let's talk again soon, m'lady.
I would like to ask some questions.
Stop waiting
Wait! This lad is now under my protection. We have come to talk in peace..

Well, I could try and buy it from him, but I'm sure he'll jack up the price. I'd need to take along a few tough-looking bastards to show him the folly of not accepting a reasonable offer. One of your companions with {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_NEEDED_MAN_COUNT} men would do the trick.
I'm looking for someone.
Hope there's enough hands for the harvest.
The grazing is worth a lot to those who own beasts
Engineer {CURRENTLY_HELD_ENGINEER}
Inn and Out
I shall stand by your side and not foresake you, and fight until my life leaves my body...

As the ruler, you have let {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} to take {?TARGET_NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} kinsman's vengeance and failed to protect the boy as you have promised to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is furious.
I should be able to find her and see what's going on.
Round is over, you are qualified for the next stage of the tournament.
How do workshops work?
If you send your best tracker with a few men, I am sure they will find my girl and be back to you in no more than {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_WAIT_DAYS} days.
It was good to meet you. Come see me if you need anything.
You need to get permission from the lord to talk to prisoners.
You failed to protect {CULPRIT.LINK} as you have promised {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is furious.
Rival Gang Moving In at {SETTLEMENT}
Very well. For now, go in peace.
Don't worry, I will protect your relative.
Well {PLAYER.NAME}, it is certainly good to see you still retain your sense of humor.[if:convo_nervous][rb:unsure]
Well {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}sir{\?}, sorry to disappoint you, but our people have some self-respect.
Please, do it for the sake of our friendship. (-{RELATION_DECREASE} to relation)
I care very little for your threats. My business is with {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK}.
This will be a massacre, not a duel, but I'm fine with that.
It's quite the opportunity to make your name. You risk no more than your teeth, and didn't the Heavens give us thirty of those, just to have a few spare for grand opportunities like this?
You have fought well. You are free to go.
You need to discuss this with our leader {LEADER.LINK}.
You don't deserve my coin. This contract is over.

{?PLAYER.GENDER}Madam{?}Sir{\?}, {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK}'s nephew murdered one of my kinsman, and it is our right to take vengeance on the murderer. Custom gives us the right of vengeance. Everyone must know that we are willing to avenge our sons, or others will think little of killing them. Does it do us good to be a clan of old men and women, drowning in silver, if all our sons are slain? Please sir, allow us to take vengeance. We promise we won't let this turn into a senseless blood feud.
If you defend a murderer than you die like a murderer. Boys, kill them all!

Only noble vassals of {FACTION_LEADER} have the honour of carrying their own banners. However, after some time of mercenary service, perhaps you can earn the opportunity to swear homage to {FACTION_LEADER} and become his vassal, gaining the right to choose a banner of your own and fight under it in battle.
Good. Give us our due, and you can pass.
Hey boss, come to check on the business?
Many contenders have swords on their backs. Still this information might prove useful.
You need {NEEDED_GOLD_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{GOLD_ICON}, {NEEDED_INFLUENCE_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{INFLUENCE_ICON}. You don't have {NEEDED_GOLD_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{GOLD_ICON}.
Your attack on {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}’s gang has angered {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} and {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} broke off the agreement that you had.
You have defeated the rival gang and protected the interests of {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} in {SETTLEMENT}.
I'm here to deliver you my demands!
No. My word is final. You will have to take the blood money.
I affirm that you are executor of the will of the Senate and people...
Your clan is now at war with the {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s faction. Your agreement has been canceled.
{GANG_LEADER}'s gang has beaten you to the ground, but somehow you managed to cling to life.
I am enchanted to have met you, my lady.
Your clan is now at war with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s realm. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is canceled.
Can't say I've seen anyone around here like that, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}.
There will be no peace between us and the {ENEMY_INFORMAL_NAME}, any more than the wolf makes peace with the sheep.
Hmm... Perhaps I will need to do more.
Who are you? What do you want from me?
I need you to craft a weapon for me
I've heard of these games...
I am sorry, I don't have that much money.
Thank you, {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. It was an honour to serve you..
.. and I shall defend your rights and the rights of your legitimate heirs.
I'm gathering an army. Summon the lords to rally to my banner. {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}
Be on your way, then.
I will put in a word about you to {KING.LINK}.
I'll be defenders.
Not if it's a duel. I challenge you. No true tournament fighter would refuse.
There's nothing I need right now.
I'm still working on it.
My name is {PLAYER.NAME}, {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. Tell me about yourself.

You asked the villagers around {CURRENT_SETTLEMENT} if they saw a young woman matching the description of {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s daughter, {TARGET_HERO.LINK}.\n\nThey said a young woman and a young man dropped by early in the morning to buy some supplies and then rode off towards {TARGET_VILLAGE}.
These nobles aren't like you and me. They've kept their wealth by crushing people like you for generations. Don't mess with them.
Thank you, {?PLAYER.GENDER}my lady{?}sir{\?}.
I don't know where {?HERO.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} is.
Round is over, your team survived the final round of the tournament.
I must think carefully about this.
Let me think about this some more.

Good! We understand the spy is going to {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}. If they're trying to gather information, they'll be wandering around the market asking questions in the guise of making small talk. Just go around talking to the townsfolk, and you should be able to figure out who it is.
{TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK}'s village {TARGET_SETTLEMENT} was raided. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is canceled.
Look all around you. People making money hand over fist, draped in silks, smelling of wine and perfume. But is it the honest folk? I think not.
Cuckoo bird, cuckoo bird, tell me no lies. 'I snuck into another bird's tree'.{newline}Cuckoo bird, cuckoo bird, say something wise. 'There's a king in Battania who's just like me.'
Let's just save ourselves some trouble, and I'll just pay you that amount.
What I want to say is... You don't need to be a part of this. I'll double whatever {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} is paying you if you join us.
I will have one of my trackers and {REQUIRED_TROOP_AMOUNT} of my men to find your daughter.
In exchange for your loyalty, I offer you the command of some of my best men. And in recognition of your worth, let me present you with this gift, which I hope will serve you well on the battlefield.
My sword is yours. For the right sum.
What else do you have to say?
Rival Gang Moving In At {SETTLEMENT}
I'm {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. Ask around about me. You'll learn I'm someone you don't want to mess with.[if:convo_stern]
How much are the prizes in the tournaments?
{CULPRIT.LINK} is no longer a member of your clan. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} was terminated.
My {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, as much as I appreciate the gesture, I am not sure that you have a suitable estate to grant me.
Do think about it. But make sure you do not end up on the losing side.
Just passing through.
Your good health, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. May I help you?
I am at your mercy.[if:convo_beaten]

Yes... I've suffered a great misfortune. My daughter, a headstrong girl, has been bewitched by this never-do-well. I told her to stop seeing him but she wouldn't listen! Now she's missing - I'm sure she's been abducted by him! I'm offering a bounty of {BASE_REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} to anyone who brings her back. Please {?PLAYER.GENDER}ma'am{?}sir{\?}! Don't let a father's heart be broken.
Never mind then.
Now get lost...
We will not forget this.
{PLAYER.NAME}.. Is that you? Am I free?
As you wish. I hereby declare your oaths to be null and void. You will no longer hold land or titles in my name, and you are released from your duties to my house. You are free, {PLAYER.NAME}.
I'll have your head on a pike for this, you bastard! Someday![if:convo_furious][ib:agressive]
Let it be known that you are one of us. We shall defend your rights as you defend ours. You may be granted lands in our domains and the authority to judge disputes.
I want you to join my army. ({INFLUENCE_COST}{INFLUENCE_ICON})
Your word shall divide the spoils of victory and the bounties of peace.
You'll know right away once the preparations are complete. Just don't leave town.
I must beg my leave.
Nothing to report, your lordship.
Do what you must.

Only my loyal vassals can own lands and castles in my realm. A mercenary can not be trusted with such a responsibility. However, after serving for some time, you can swear homage to me and become my vassal. Then you will be rewarded with a fief.
You received a message from {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. "This may not have seemed like an important task, but I placed my trust in you. I guess I was wrong to do so."
Thank you, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, thank you.

If you've got more mouths in your house than your land will feed, {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME} will let you work a bit of {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} property - but he'll take a third of your harvest, even if you're kin.
I don't think I owe you such a favor {PLAYER.NAME}. I see no reason to accept this for you.[if:convo_stern]
I want to end our contract.
They say the merchant {NOTABLE.LINK} is hiring at {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} {.%}{SHOP_TYPE}{.%}. {?NOTABLE.GENDER}She{?}He{\?}'s a harsh master but a fair one, they say.
My hair is fine as it is, thank you.
My dear {PLAYER.NAME}, your generous gift has led me to reconsider what you ask, and I have come to appreciate the wisdom of your proposal.
Barter line - player should not see this
I am looking for a spy. Have you seen any warriors in the tournament wandering about, asking too many suspicious questions?
Really boss, if I sell everything, and with all the money we have on hand, you can get {PRICE}{GOLD_ICON}. You sure you want to sell?
I did what I had to do. Pack up, you need to go.
What do you want, you degenerate?[if:convo_stern]

I told that silly {RANDOM_RELATIVE} of mine. I told him. I said, 'You take money from {NOTABLE.LINK}, {?NOTABLE.GENDER}she{?}he{\?}'ll want back double. And if you value the bones in your hands, you'll pay.' I told him, I did.
I don't have any other jobs for you right now.
I have no wish to fight you.[ib:closed][if:idle_angry]
I see your wager. Let's play.

You want some mercenary work, eh? Well, we are glad to take fighters, whether they seek glory or gold. If you fight for us, you will receive {MERCENARY_AWARD}{GOLD_ICON} whenever you defeat a party of enemies, or for any other significant deed.
Of course, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. Go in.
You bastard![ib:aggressive][if:convo_furious]
This sounds pretty serious. Go on.
Anything else I can do for you?
Having a look. Do you mind?
{LEADER.LINK}, {LIEGE}
Sure, boss go ahead.
I'll need you to lead a party.
I swear by my ancestors that you are lawful {FACTION_TITLE}.

Valiant warriors have always been welcomed as citizens of the Empire and granted lands, titles and honors, {PLAYER.NAME}, but you have yet to prove yourself. Take your sword to my enemies and we may speak of this later.
You're of the {FACTION}, right? That means you're my prisoner.
No thanks are necessary.
Thank you, good {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}sire{\?}. I never forget someone who's done me a good turn.[if:convo_calm_friendly]
Great Khan Monchug lifts his hand. We all hark to his command!{newline}Great Khan Monchug rides away. We go back to nap and play.
Direction of daughter and rogue
As it happens, {PLAYER.NAME}, I promised {FACTION_LEADER} that I would hire a company of mercenaries for an upcoming campaign.
You lost the board game and failed to help {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. "Thank you for trying, {PLAYER.NAME}, but I guess I chose the wrong person for the job."
Lads! Do you hear me? Take them down!
{SETTLEMENT} was raided, Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is canceled.
Thank you and good day my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}.
You received a message from {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. "Thank you for killing the spy. Please accept these {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars with our gratitude."

I lost a mule loaded with wares when it slid into the river, and {HARSH_MERCHANT.NAME} said he'd take it from my wages for the next year, didn't care if I starved. If I didn't like it then I could go beg on the street, he said to me. So look at me. I stood up to him and look at me now.
Very well. Do come back when you're ready, {?PLAYER.GENDER}my lady{?}my lord{\?}.
Now that's an unpleasant set of options. How about we just go our separate ways?[ib:closed]
Any news? Have you managed to find him yet?
What exactly is {GAME_NAME}?

{ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}, a gang leader from {SETTLEMENT}, has told you about a new gang that is trying to get a hold on the town. You asked {COMPANION.LINK} to take {TROOP_COUNT} of your best men to stay with {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} and help {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} in the coming gang war. They should return to you in {RETURN_DAYS} days.
What's your story again?
What would it take for you to go your way, and for me to go my way?
I need you to follow me for a while.

Your {?PLAYER.GENDER}ladyship{?}lordship{\?}... This is quite the honor. Do you play {GAME_NAME}? It's the traditional pastime of the {CULTURE_NAME}, and I am reckoned a master. If you wish to play a game, please, take a seat and we'll start.
You are wounded
Actually, I have other things to do. Maybe later.
Very well. You may consider yourself under the protection of the {FACTION_NAME}. You have until this time tomorrow to complete your journey, or we may ask for another payment from you.
It seems the village has been raided a short while ago. You found nothing but smoke, fire and crying people.
I thank you my {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}.
What are you planning to do?
Some day you may wish to save the life of one of your sons through blood money. If you refuse mercy, mercy may be refused you.
You don't have {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}.
Good, I'll have my men write up a simple contract. On behalf of the {KINGDOM_FORMAL_NAME}, I welcome you. May you put your sword to good use against our enemies.
Time has taken its toll on us all, friend. It's time that you retire.
As far as I know, we have no contract to fight you.
This a {.%}{WORKSHOP_TYPE}{.%}, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}.
Think nothing of it. I'm glad you're safe.
Very well. Expect no mercy.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
You could say perhaps that I am between jobs right now, so if by any chance you are looking to hire... Well, I'm open to discussion.
Well. Let me put things this way...
Ok then. I will call my men to help you form a caravan. I hope it brings you a good profit.
I would like to sell this workshop.
I'm still gathering my men for the fight. I'll send a runner for you when the time comes.
How much are the prizes in the practice fights?

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, a lord from the {QUEST_GIVER_CLAN} clan, asked you to free {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} relative. The young man is currently held by {TARGET_HERO.LINK} a local gang leader because of his debts. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}Lady{?}Lord{\?} {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has given you enough gold to settle {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} debts but {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} encourages you to keep the money to yourself and make an example of these criminals so no one would dare to hold a nobleman again. You have sent {COMPANION.LINK} and {NEEDED_MEN_COUNT} men to take care of the situation for you. They should be back in {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_DURATION} days.
Then you will pay with blood!
Don't attack! We surrender.
I'm {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. Ask around about me. Let's just say I've got a talent for solving people's problems, so to speak.[if:convo_bemused]

I’m not inclined to pay the debt. I’m not going to reward this kind of lawlessness, when even the best families aren’t safe. I’ve sent word to the lord of {SETTLEMENT_NAME} but I can’t say I expect to hear back, what with the wars and all. I want someone to go there and free the lad. You could pay, I suppose, but I’d prefer it if you taught those bastards a lesson. I’ll pay you either way but obviously you get to keep more if you use force.
A face without scars and markings is usual for farmers and merchants but less so for warriors. This might be useful.
Very well... You may go.
I am ready to pay my debt.
Yes, have you made any progress on it?
I'm not yielding, so let's go to it, then.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
All those bastards walking around drunk and bothering folks.. But they work for {NOTABLE.LINK} and you can't say a thing if you value your head.
Sitting in the marketplace all day one learns many things if one keeps one's ears open... But alas, I have heard nothing recently that might interest your worshipful self.
Farewell, {PLAYER.NAME}. I regret that we part on these terms.
No, no. I know a trap when I see one. You win. Good-bye.
Farewell then, {PLAYER.NAME}, and good luck go with you.
Ah! Now that was as good a fight as any I've had. Here, take this purse, you deserve it.
But I've promised to find you and return you to your {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}mother{?}father{\?}. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} would be devastated.
So be it. You may ply your wit on the carrion-fowl.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
Spare us from {?OWNER.GENDER}ladies{?}lords{\?} like {OWNER.LINK}, whose hearts are too tender to punish the thieves and rogues who terrorize honest folk.
your service
I accept these conditions and I am ready to pay {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} to create a caravan.
Family Feud
I'll go right away.
You need {NEEDED_GOLD_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{GOLD_ICON}, {NEEDED_INFLUENCE_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{INFLUENCE_ICON}. You don't have {NEEDED_INFLUENCE_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{INFLUENCE_ICON}.

{ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}, a landowner from {ISSUE_GIVER_SETTLEMENT}, told you about an incident that is about to turn into an ugly feud. One youth killed another in an accident and the victim's family refused blood money, indicating that they want revenge. You decided to leave {COMPANION.LINK} with some man for {RETURN_DAYS} days to let things cool down. They should return with the reward of {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars as promised by {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} after {RETURN_DAYS} days.
Go on. I'm ready for more.
Yes, it's fine.

Say what you will about {?OWNER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} {OWNER.LINK}... {?OWNER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?}'ll give the lowest wretch in the realm a fair hearing in {?OWNER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} court. Can't deny that.
Well then, we have a deal. I will instruct my workers that they are now working for you. Good luck!
Practice Fight
My husband was wounded in the wars, and now can't pull a plow. So he lost his tenancy, and now I must beg in the marketplace.
It's a lean autumn, this one. Heaven help us lay in enough wood before the winter.
Good day, friend. You look like you know your way around an arena. How can I help you?
We will meet again.
